ValidationRule.description: Milestones required for NB opps stage 1
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "1 - Qualify Opportunity"), Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c), NOT(ISNEW()),
OR( A_Customer_confirmed_interest__c = FALSE, B_Customer_attended_meeting__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check milestones A & B to advance to stage 1
